page.title: 09Denby School - 1985
page.content: The school was modernised in 1965. There are inside toilets, 2 classrooms and a hall. There are{12 infants}and {11 junior}children in the school. When the children are 10 years old they go to Scissett Middle School. The school has a playground at the front and a playing field at the back. Meals are prepared at the school. They are cook/chill meals. There are{2 full time teachers}and a part time teacher. We do all sorts of things at school. Besides Maths and English, we paint and model using clay, balsa and other materials. We have PE and games and now have a BBC computer. On Thursday all the juniors go swimming. In summer we join other primary schools in a sports day.
